thread.title: Ruby Rose tweets as gunman found and arrested in backyard | dailytelegraph.com.au
thread.title_full: Ruby Rose tweets as gunman found and arrested in backyard | dailytelegraph.com.au

author: STAFF WRITERS
title: Ruby Rose tweets as gunman found and arrested in backyard | dailytelegraph.com.au
text:
AUSSIE actor Ruby Rose has live tweeted a ‘petrifying’ ordeal that involved a gunman being spotted and arrested in her backyard.
The Orange Is The New Black star took to social media as “helicopters, police and dogs” came to her rescue.
“There is a gunman in my back yard (sic). This is petrifying. Helicopters, police, dogs ... And a crazy person,” she tweeted.
About 20 minutes later, she confirmed the man was arrested.
“Man arrested. Wow. Crazy. Annnd now I won’t be watching horror films before bed anymore,” she wrote.
But minutes after posting a short video of police outside her house with the caption “when you’re supposed to be on a date with @skrillex but. Something comes up”, the actor deleted all the posts from social media.
Ruby Rose removed her Tweets about the incident. Source: Getty Images
Originally published as Ruby live-tweets ‘petrifying’ gunman ordeal
